content.title: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy
content.definition: Evidence-based psychotherapy targeting thoughts and behaviors
key_points: Core concept of Cognitive Behavioral Therapy
Essential understanding of Cognitive Behavioral Therapy
Clinical/practical relevance of Cognitive Behavioral Therapy
clinical_pearls: Important consideration for Cognitive Behavioral Therapy
examples: Example application of Cognitive Behavioral Therapy
content.statement: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Psychiatry that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding Cognitive Behavioral Therapy helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of Cognitive Behavioral Therapy include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of Cognitive Behavioral Therapy.
